act_summary: This section of the Companies Act 2013 addresses the liability for false or misleading statements in prospectuses. It stipulates that any person authorized to issue a prospectus must prove immateriality or reasonable belief in truthfulness if they can demonstrate that such statements were not material or were necessary at the time of issuance.
